response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This unique item holds immense value to me, but I understand its true worth to you lies at $800,000. After careful consideration and evaluation of its intrinsic qualities, I am prepared to offer it to you at a price that reflects not only its market value but also acknowledges its significance to you.

I propose to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This price allows us both to benefit: it represents a fair return for my investment while also being within your budgetary constraints. I believe this offer strikes a balance that honors the product's value and respects your financial situation.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will serve you exceptionally well and bring you the satisfaction it deserves.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
